name: MAKIBISHI COMIC
description:
Players take on the role of an Assassin and must find five hidden ninjas.
　Click on the suspicious places to make the world move and clear😇.
　The story? You'll have to make up for that with your imagination and spunk.
　That's the privilege of being human and a living being.



　The world of Makibishi Comic is full of gimmicks.
　What? Gimmicks are too absurd?
　The real world is much more absurd 😤.
　Taxes when you live, taxes when you die.

＜Tell me! Mr. Rabbit's World Explained＞


　You'll see a lot of ennui and unique characters!
　And they make the world go round.



　This is where the game begins and where the captured ninjas are housed.



　It's a production center for mass-produced ninjas.
　Big Baby's ears are leaking sound...



　This is the area where skirmishes between ninjas and monkeys frequently occur.
　If you can stop the skirmishes...



　This is a base for space exploration.
　Rumor has it that if you collect eight Makibishi Balls, any wish will come true.



　This is an underground laboratory.
　When the giant robot is completed, we will conquer the world.
　Fish have weak eyes. Most creatures have a weakness in their eyes.
　In a fight, you aim for the eyes.



　This is the castle town where the lord lives.
　The "mysterious clock" that can change the time is the symbol of the town.
　You must find five dummy dolls. Ha ha ha.



　Let me tell you two good things.
　1."It's dangerous to go alone! Take this."
　2."All your base are belong to us."
　3."Thank you Mario! But our princess is in another castle!"
